eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
 S&=& S_B+S_F \nonumber \\
 S_B &=& \frac{1}{4\pi alpha'}\int d^2\sigma \, 
\left\lbrack\partial_+Z^1\partial_- Z^1 +\partial_+Z^2 \partial_- Z^2+ 
\partial_+ X^I \partial_- X^I \right. \nonumber \\
 && \hspace{1in} \left. - m^2 (X^I)^2 
- 4m Z^2\partial_{\tau} Z^1\right\rbrack~,
\label{bosonic action} \\
 S_F &=& \frac{i}{2\pi} \int d^2 \sigma\,
\left\lbrack S \left(\partial_+ -\frac{m}{2}\gamma^1\bar{\gamma}^2\right) S + 
\tilde{S}\left(\partial_- - \frac{m}{2}\gamma^1\bar{\gamma}^2 \right)\tilde{S} 
-2mS\Pi\tilde{S}
\right\rbrack~,
\label{fermionic action}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
H(\equiv -alpha'p^+p^-) &=& 
\int d\sigma\, \left(\Pi_r\partial_{\tau}Z^r + \Pi_I \partial_{\tau}X^I
  +lambda_a \partial_{\tau}S^a +\tilde{lambda}_a \partial_{\tau}\tilde{S}^a - L\right)
\nonumber\\
&=& \frac{W^2R_T^2}{2alpha'} + 2m N^{(+)}_0 
+ \sum_{n\neq 0} \left\lbrack (omega_n+m)N^{(+)}_n +
(omega_n-m)N^{(-)}_n\right\rbrack + \sum_{I=3}^8 \sum_{n\in \mbox{\scriptsize {\bf Z}}} omega_nN_n^I
\nonumber\\
&& \hspace{1in }+ \sum_{n\in\mbox{\scriptsize {\bf Z}}} \left\lbrack 
\left(omega_n+\frac{m}{2}\right) N^{(+)}_{F,\,n} 
+ \left(omega_n-\frac{m}{2}\right) N^{(-)}_{F,\,n}
\right\rbrack~.
\label{H 1}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 Z^+(\sigma_1+2\pi,\sigma_2)&=& Z^+(\sigma_1,\sigma_2)+
  \frac{i\beta}{\sqrt{2}}w ~,\nonumber\\
 Z^+(\sigma_1+2\pi\tau_1,\sigma_2+2\pi \tau_2)
&=& Z^+(\sigma_1,\sigma_2)+\frac{i\beta}{\sqrt{2}}n ~,\nonumber\\
Z^-(\sigma_1+2\pi,\sigma_2)&=& Z^-(\sigma_1,\sigma_2)
-\frac{i\beta}{\sqrt{2}}w +2\pi R_- r~,\nonumber\\
Z^-(\sigma_1+2\pi\tau_1,\sigma_2+2\pi\tau_2)
&=& Z^-(\sigma_1,\sigma_2)-\frac{i\beta}{\sqrt{2}}n +2\pi R_- s~, \nonumber\\
&& \hspace{1in} (w,n,r,s \in \mbox{{\bf Z}})~.
\label{instanton}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\Sigma(\sigma_1+2\pi,\sigma_2)&=& 
(-1)^w e^{-i \pi\hat{\mu}\nu w \gamma^1\bar{\gamma}^2}
\Sigma(\sigma_1,\sigma_2) ~,\nonumber\\
\tilde{\Sigma}(\sigma_1+2\pi,\sigma_2)&=& 
(-1)^w e^{-i \pi\hat{\mu}\nu w \gamma^1\bar{\gamma}^2}
\tilde{\Sigma}(\sigma_1,\sigma_2) ~,\nonumber\\
\Sigma(\sigma_1+2\pi\tau_1,\sigma_2+2\pi\tau_2) 
&=& (-1)^n e^{-i\pi\hat{\mu}\nu n \gamma^1\bar{\gamma}^2}\Sigma(\sigma_1,\sigma_2)
~,\nonumber\\
\tilde{\Sigma}(\sigma_1+2\pi\tau_1,\sigma_2+2\pi\tau_2) 
&=& (-1)^n e^{-i\pi\hat{\mu}\nu n \gamma^1\bar{\gamma}^2}\tilde{\Sigma}(\sigma_1,\sigma_2)~.
\label{bc Sigma}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 S&=& S_B+S_F \nonumber \\
 S_B &=& \frac{1}{4\pi alpha'}\int d^2\sigma \, 
\left\lbrack\partial_+Z^1\partial_- Z^1 +\partial_+Z^2 \partial_- Z^2+ 
\partial_+ X^I \partial_- X^I \right. \nonumber \\
